00014 #include "cspline.h"
00015 #include <vector>
00016 
00017 CSplineApprox::CSplineApprox(const std::map<double, double> &pts)
00018 {
00019     m_accel = gsl_interp_accel_alloc();
00020     m_spline = gsl_spline_alloc(gsl_interp_cspline, pts.size());
00021 
00022     std::vector<double> x, y;
00023     for(std::map<double, double>::const_iterator it = pts.begin(); it != pts.end(); it++) {
00024         x.push_back(it->first);
00025         y.push_back(it->second);
00026     }
00027     gsl_spline_init(m_spline, &x[0], &y[0], x.size());
00028 }
00029 
00030 CSplineApprox::~CSplineApprox()
00031 {
00032     gsl_spline_free(m_spline);
00033     gsl_interp_accel_free(m_accel);
00034 }
00035 double
00036 CSplineApprox::approx(double x) const
00037 {
00038     return gsl_spline_eval(m_spline, x, m_accel);
00039 }
